"Very friendly group of snowbirds here! Lots of year round residents as well. Al & Eva were GREAT as the activity directors, coming up with new things all the time. Breakfast & Taco Tuesday were great. Bingo was fun. We stayed a month, would have liked to stay another 2 weeks or so."
DeeAnn - Google Review
RV Park near Silver Springs State Park in Florida
Balance tranquility and adventure – Across from Silver Springs State Park in Silver Springs, FL
Silver Springs RV Park, your serene getaway nestled in Silver Springs, FL is a conveniently located RV park so close to Silver Springs State Park that you can walk to it! Whether you are a part of
our vibrant 55+ community in the winter or enjoying all-age family fun in the summer
, our park is designed to offer a memorable stay year-round.
Discover Comfort and Leisure
Silver Springs RV Park boasts amenities that will make you never want to leave. Dive into relaxation at our
large
heated pool, complete with spacious and comfortable poolside lounging. This area is ideal for soaking up the sun, relaxing with family, meeting new friends, or getting lost in your favorite book. Stay connected with our FREE Wi-Fi available at the clubhouse and pool areas or sign up for our premium Wi-Fi to retain access throughout the entire park.
A Snowbird RV Park Paradise
During our RV park’s snowbird season, we offer a wide variety of recreational activities you can enjoy without leaving the park! Challenge friends and family to games of shuffleboard, Wii Bowling, or bocce ball. Come spend some leisure time in our game room, where you can take part in cards, bingo, crafts, and more. Our calendar is packed with live entertainment, dances, potlucks, cookouts, ice cream socials, movie nights, card games, arts and crafts, and more! There is always something going on for our active
senior and all-age family
crowd!
Culture and Adventure Awaits
Explore and discover the local culture with visits to the Appleton Museum of Art, Silver River Museum, and Marion County Museum of History and Archaeology. For the thrill seekers amongst us, we are close to The Canyons Zip Line and Adventure Park while the Sawmill Disc Golf Course and Ocala Golf Course provide more relaxed activities.
Your Perfect Escape in FL
Silver Springs RV Park is more than just a place to stay, we are a community. Join us to make new friends, learn new skills, practice new hobbies, and explore all the wonders that Florida’s nature and culture have to offer.
Nearby Attractions in Silver Springs

Contact Silver Springs RV Park Get in Touch Thank you for considering Silver Springs RV Park for your upcoming camping adventure. We are here to make your stay unforgettable and ensure your questions are promptly answered. Please feel free to reach out to us by email or phone, and we’ll be delighted to assist you. Silver Springs RV Park – 8.6 miles from Exit 352 on 1-75 3151 NE 56th Avenue Silver Springs, FL 34488 Phone: 352-236-3700 Email: mgr@silverspringsrvpark.com Hours Check-In Time: 12:00 PM Check-Out Time: 11:00 AM Office Hours Peak Season (October 1 – April 30) Monday – Saturday: 9:00 AM – 5:30 PM Sunday: 9:00 AM – 1:00 PM Off Season (May 1 – September 30) Monday – Saturday 9:00 AM – 5:30 PM Sunday: Closed Newsletter Signup Sign up to receive new information and discounts from Silver Springs RV Park Widget by WYSIWYG Widgets v2.3.10 - https://wordpress.org/plugins/wysiwyg-widgets/ / WYSIWYG Widgets Call to Reserve Your Seasonal Site 352-236-3700 or BOOK ONLINE NOW
